title: Darby's Birthday Party
subtle: Personal Narrative (fiction), 350 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 400L
description: Darby's Birthday Party is about a dog named Darby who is going to be 15 years old. His human friends, Mia and Mike, decide to have a special birthday party for Darby, but they are not sure where it should take place. They consider many locations and finally settle on a place that is Darby's favorite--the zoo.
meta: birthday, favorite, Friday, party, special, unhappy
